name: Memorial Hermann-Texas Medical Center
sites.location_details: Located in the Memorial Hermann-Texas Medical Center Atrium. Please park in valet (free for patients only) at 6411 Fannin Street and proceed to the ground floor of the Atrium.

name: Memorial Hermann Greater Heights Hospital
sites.location_details: Located in Conference Rooms C & D. Enter the hospital through the South Tower Circle Drive Entrance and the conference room is on the left.

name: Memorial Hermann Southwest Hospital
sites.location_details: Located in Southwest Pavilion Suite. Please park in the garage (located next to the emergency room). Proceed to medical plaza 1 entrance (located across from the garage) and inform the screening station that you are here for a vaccine appointment.

name: Memorial Hermann Southeast Hospital
sites.location_details: Located in the CES Conference Room on the 1st floor of the main hospital building. Enter the hospital main entrance. Inform staff at the front screening desk in the hospital lobby that you are here to receive the COVID-19 vaccine.

name: Memorial Hermann Memorial City Medical Center
sites.location_details: Located on the 12th floor of the Memorial Hermann Tower (MHT). Please park in Garage 5 and take the sky walk to the MHT.

name: Memorial Hermann Katy Hospital
sites.location_details: Located in the Tiger Classroom B in West Tower, 1st Floor.

name: Memorial Hermann Northeast Hospital
sites.location_details: Enter the hospital through the East Entrance and proceed to the “Patient Access Lobby” past the screening station.

name: Memorial Hermann Cypress Hospital
sites.location_details: Located in Bridgeland Conference Room in the 1st floor Conference Center (past the Chapel).

name: Memorial Hermann Medical Group West University
sites.address:
3525 W Holcombe Blvd, 1st Floor
Houston, TX 77025

name: Memorial Hermann Medical Group Spring Primary Care (located in the CCC)
Memorial Hermann Medical Group League City Primary Care (located in the CCC)
sites.address:
2555 Gulf Freeway South, Suite 600
League City, TX 77573

name: Memorial Hermann Neighborhood Health Center - Greater Heights
sites.location_details: The clinic is located adjacent to Memorial Hermann Greater Heights Hospital.

name: Memorial Hermann Neighborhood Health Center – Northeast
sites.location_details: The clinic is located in the shopping center directly in front of Memorial Hermann Northeast Hospital.
